thread.section_title: Brilliance.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Brilliance.com | www.brilliance.com
thread.title: Ron Handel

author: Ron Handel
title: Ron Handel
text: Doing business with Brilliance.com was great! They really pulled me out of a jam with quick and very professional service. I ordered diamond earring really close to Christmas and Jackie kept me in the loop via email to assure me that my order would be delivered in time for Christmas. When the diamond studs arrived they were AWESOME. I would buy from Brilliamce.com again!
